releases.goal: Deploy new portal code with Okta off
lines: Devops will create PI Portal package for internal and external
This PI Portal Package is locked with Okta off setting in UCD
Deploy package with Okta setting to off
Validate this package is working as expected with Okta off
This proves, the connectivity to the Postgres SQL database
Firewall rules and database credentials are correct
Fallback package to production package, aka Chrome version.

releases.goal: Deploy PI Portal with Okta on Internal and off for external
lines: Deploy PI Portal package for internal on and external off
QA validates Okta is working on internal
QA validates Okta off on external
Fallback package to production package, aka RC1.
